description:
Labeling sequences (any kind of sequences), using Python. E.g. using python-crfsuite, sklearn-crfsuite, PyStruct, pytorch-crf, and others. Not as trendy as "deep learning", but:
- quite reliable, used in leading linguistic packages,
- can give good results on limited training data (provided you can specify features, which requires domain knowledge),
- but computationally intensive.

Colab Notebook: https://bit.ly/crf-wordseg https://bit.ly/crf-wordseg-slides
title: Sequence Labeling with python-crfsuite
